modName: Witch Armour by Neo CBBE UNP
summary: Add New Armours from the \"Dark Force\".
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=yellow][size=5]Neo\'s Witch Armour (CBBE/UNP)[/size][/color][/b]

Author : Meister aka Neovinci

=================================

[youtube]GBvNfS0v3mU[/youtube]
[youtube]7GIvnHMcDzk[/youtube]
[youtube]SJTQGbSvNsE[/youtube]
[youtube]w1pB24u4krw[/youtube]

Add New Armours from the \"Dark Force\".

It began with an impression of \"Nightsisters\" among of the \"Star Wars\" concept arts.
also inspired from Aery Soul\'s a beautiful 3D work \"Hear-No-Evil\".
I just reconstituted those concepts for it.


-It has light and heavy armours for female.

-You can craft it with \"Steel Smithing Perk\"

-All Armours are also temperable.

-Be careful, If you don\'t get the Steel perk yet, you have to go into the \"Shimmermist Grotto\".



There is possibility contorted unnaturally with some active poses.

Use 7z tool, Unzip and Drag into DATA folder where your Skyrim is installed.

(..STEAM/steamapps/common/skyrim/Data)



May the Force be with You.


===============================================================

[b]-Optional Hood Add-On updated - makes available to use for all races includes Argonian, Khajit and Orc.
You can use it in any type of Bodies. Extract the file, copy and paste into your Data folder.[/b]

===============================================================

[b][color=yellow]Locaton :[/color][/b] In a container, inside of the Shimmermist Grotto.(as screenshot)

[b][color=yellow]Requirement :[/color][/b] Calientes Female Body for female Armours(for CBBE version - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666)
[b][color=yellow]Requirement :[/color][/b] DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99(for UNP version - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709)

[b][color=yellow]Recommend :[/color][/b] CBBEv3M Body Repalacer by MAK03 (for CBBE version - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13180)

=========================================================================================

[b][color=yellow]Credit[/color][/b]

thanks to

Betheada for this wonderful land.

Caliente for nice CBBE Female Body

MAK07 for CBBEv3M Body Repalacer

dimon99 for DIMONIZED UNP female body

George Lucas and his staff for wonderful movie series \"Star Wars\" (please make epVII, VIII and IX)

Aery Soul for beautiful 3D work, \"Hear-No-Evil\" (some part designs inspired from it)

Saratje for her advice and information

Lord Haun, author of the \"Magicka Sabers\" for this file-page images.

NeighborlyNinja, author of the \"Magicka Sabers Black Hilt Edition\" for this file-page images.

KahjiitRaj, author of the \"Review Studio With Green Screen Rooms\" for this file-page images.

Blender developers

Members of \'NAVER ElderScrolls7\' cafe for useful tips and tutorials

Members of \'Naver Escroll\' cafe

TESNEXUS Staff membership and many Nexus friends 


========================================================================================

[b]You can do whatever with it for personal usage. 
It\'s not free for other\'s Conversion, neither Upload on any other sites.
Do not upload anywhere include Steam workshop without my Permission.
If You want it, Send A PM or Mail to Me.[/b]
author: Meister aka Neovinci
